installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install unzip wget ca-certificates

## Mount Pterodactyl Docker Container
if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

## Go to server directory
cd /mnt/server

## Backup Config Files
rm *.bak
cp ./Server/Multiplayer/main/dedicated.cfg dedicated.cfg.bak
cp ./Server/Zombie/main/dedicated_zm.cfg dedicated_zm.cfg.bak

## Download Latest Server File Version
echo "Downloading latest version of plutonium please wait..."
wget https://dl.axite.dev/T6-Server.zip -q --show-progress

## Extract Server
unzip -o T6-Server.zip
rm T6-Server.zip
mv ./T6-Server/* ./
rm -r ./T6-Server

## Clean unneeded files
if [ -d ./IW4MAdmin];
then rm -r ./IW4MAdmin
fi;

## Restore Config Files
cp -rf dedicated.cfg.bak ./Server/Multiplayer/main/dedicated.cfg
cp -rf dedicated_zm.cfg.bak ./Server/Multiplayer/main/dedicated_zm.cfg

chmod -R 777 ./*
## Make User Aware of the Setup Origin
echo "# Unofficial Pterodactyl-Plutonium Server https://github.com/GaryCraft/ptero-plutonium" > README.md

echo "Server Succesfully Installed Enjoy!"
